item.title: Self Driving Car
item.description: Intro # Reading # SAE J3016: Autonomous Car Level # source 1 all human adaptive cruise control, anti-lock braking system, electronic stabilty control hazard-minimizing longitudinal/ lateral control, emergency braking full autonomy under certain condition, but human take control when in danger full autonomy under certain condition, can replace human at some cases fully autonomous Decision making # On-board sensors LIDAR camera GPS/INS odometry(angle) Hierachical Decision Making System Route Planning
